    public class CustomListGrid
extends com.smartgwt.client.widgets.grid.ListGrid
    A custom ListGrid that displays a variable list of fields for each item, rather than a fixed set for all items. Also formats some of the fields that have special identifiers before them. Auto-detects URLs and makes them links.
    Author:
    JSTASIK
